title: 246: How Your Body Reflects Your Personality with Aaron Alexander
itunes:title: 246: How Your Body Reflects Your Personality with Aaron Alexander
description:
In this episode, we discuss how your body is the secret map towards what is going on inside. We discuss Aaron's body archetypes, based on how fluid/ rigid/ tense/ anxious we are, as well as the importance of floor culture. Sitting on chairs is KILLING us and you'll find out why in this episode!

Check out Aaron's new book "The Aligned Method" and connect with him @alignpodcast

Receive 15% off Four Sigmatic at foursigmatic.com with code "sahara"

Get 20% off your Organifi Green Juice + Adaptogenic Superfood blends at organifi.com with coupon code "sahara"

Try Vahdam Teas chai sampler by heading over to https://www.vahdamteas.com/collections/sahara-rose and use coupon code "sahara" for 20% off

Banyan Botanical’s Adrenal Nourish, is super supportive during stressful times. It is loaded with adaptogens like organic ashwagandha and tulsi that can help you stay energized yet calm throughout your day AND help you sleep at night.

Save 20% on Adrenal Nourish and Organic Ashwagandha at banyanbotanicals.com/sahara.

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz
